title: Dr. Jose Antonio de Almada (Avenue of)
original_title: Doutor Jose Antonio de Almada (Avenida do)
body: It is the old path of Pontinha, built by 1874. It passes to the south of the Vigias and Lambert estates, and to open it, it was necessary to destroy some rocks on the coast, which were next to these estates.

1874: Construction of the old path of Pontinha
